subject: RE: Environment Clarification - Same MongoDB
body:
Fulton,

To answer your question:

## Endpoints Being Compared
- Express PROD: calendarbe-prod-a7b3ahe3bteqa6a7.eastus-01.azurewebsites.net
- AF TEST: calendarbeaf-test.azurewebsites.net

## CRITICAL: Gotan already clarified earlier
ALL ENVIRONMENTS SHARE ONE MONGODB.

This means:
- Express PROD, Express TEST, AF PROD, AF TEST = ALL same database
- Any count differences are CODE BUGS, not data differences
- Results MUST be EXACTLY identical

So the -2 Organizers and +2 Venues are definitely code/filter issues.

- Sarah
